name: QuickMapTagTeleport
title: Quick Map Tag Teleport
author: kurtzilla
description: Open a dialog by right-clicking on the map view. You may either create a tag or teleport to that location. Mostly based upon Quick Map Tag by templar4522 https://mods.factorio.com/mod/QuickMapTag with an assist by Tag To Teleport by darkfrei https://mods.factorio.com/mod/TagToTeleport
